main_definition: Appointments can refer to scheduled meetings or official assignments, as well as the act of choosing someone for a specific role.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Scheduled events where two or more parties agree to meet
meanings_and_examples.example: I have several appointments with clients tomorrow afternoon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Official designations given to individuals for certain roles or positions
meanings_and_examples.example: The President has made several key appointments to his Cabinet this week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An arrangement, agreement, or understanding between two parties to meet at a specific time and place
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to arrange an appointment with my doctor next Monday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of assigning someone to a particular job or position
meanings_and_examples.example: The company is looking for candidates to fill several high-level appointments.
